name: Heart Care
description: My Health Care is where skill and modern technology meet to save and improve lives of both the young and old. From life saving cardiac surgeries to high –tech interventional cardiology –our team of specialist cover the full spectrum of heart diseases with skill and precision.

name: Skin Aesthetic & Laser
description: One stop centre for all types of hair, nail & skin problems

name: Internal Medicine
description: Our Internists look at your body in its entirety and are specialists in diagnostics, long-term care, preventative medicine and more. They are often best able to manage the treatment of ongoing illnesses as well as prescribing preventative measures. With this kind of expertise many patients often see an internist as their primary physician.

name: Diet & Nutrition
description: At My Health Care we have Diet & Nutrition Centre with experienced Dieticians who will provide Diet Chart and Diet counseling according to the physical condition or as per the advice of treating consultant.

name: Child Development
description: Our motto is to prevent disability, optimize development and improve quality of survival of all children in Bangladesh. To establish child and family-friendly Child Developmental Centre (CDC) we apply strategies and tools standardized for Bangladeshi children for early screening, assessment.

name: Women Care
description: My Health Care takes care of Obstetric and Gynecological patients at the 7th and 8th floor of the main hospital building. The OBGYN consultants provide antenatal care for pregnant ladies

name: Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation
description: Department of physiotherapy at My Health Care provide services for the patients with various disabilities. Dr.Esakkimuthu asary subbian and Prof. Dr. M A Rashid as consultants supervise the facilities and services in the department .

name: Dental Care
description: My Health Care Clinic cares for our patients’ dental and oral health.  We offer a wide range of dental services from basic and preventive dental work.
